name: RollerCoaster Tycoon: Deluxe
notes: Requires GOG installer v2 or above.

files.setup: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/RollerCoaster Tycoon Deluxe/RCT.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /dir="C:\GOG Games\RollerCoaster Tycoon Deluxe"
    executable: $setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  version: tkg-4.3-x86_64
